DOC.brief_summary: Procure blood specimens from individuals presenting to the emergency department (ED) with signs and /or symptoms of systemic infection or sepsis. The samples will be used for research and development activities related to sepsis, infections, etc.
DOC.brief_title: Procurement of Human Specimens for the Evaluation of Early Markers of Sepsis
DOC.criteria: 18 yrs of age or older For women of child bearing years: not known to be pregnant Blood culture ordered as part of the ED, ICU (or equivalent) or hospital floor stay. Previously enrolled in this study Vulnerable individual Unable to speak and/or understand English
